nodes.text: Cosweg Budeesho was a veteran holographer and cartoonist who lived on the planet Ando Prime with his wife Seeja and their pet tooka, Yari. During the Clone Wars, he produced the propaganda piece "Do Your Part!" for the Intergalactic Association of Amalgamated Droid Builders with the aim of encouraging viewers of all ages to sign up as droid technicians for the Confederacy of Independent Systems. Other works he produced were published in materials put out by TriPlanetary Press, Baobab Publishing and the Shafr Center Press as well as other small publishing houses.
Cosweg Budeesho was first mentioned in the reference book Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy, which was released on October 25, 2016 and written by Pablo Hidalgo.
